name: My Last Hanami
description:
Made by  @mahjoub_gamedev  in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50

Check here also the Ludum Dare project page

Description

As an old monk, you feel called by your will and try to always help lost spirits met on your way. While looking for beautiness before flying away, all theses spirits are desperately waiting for the next Hanami (a Japanese tradition of cherry-blossom viewing).

Gameplay

The gameplay is mainly a platformer with a bit of reflexion, and where some mechanics using bamboos will be introduce while progressing.

Commands

  • Arrows or QWERTY for movements   
  • SPACE or UP for jumping
  • Click or X or Action
  • R for restarting current level
Mahjoub · LD50-Main
